Contact Item

Source: R/utils_shiny.R
contact_item.Rd

Creates an item to be placed in a contact dropdownmenu.

Usage,
contact_item(
  name = "First Name, Last Name",
  role = "Role",
  phone = "###-###-####",
  email = "first.last@oliverwyman.com"
)

Arguments

name

Name

role

Role

phone

Phone

email

Email

Value

contact menu item

Contents
